name: Doodlegram
0:
”Alexa, open doodle gram”
”add a green triangle”
”move it left three times”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doodle gram
des:
Create pictures by adding shapes and moving them around. You can also rotate, grow, shrink, or change their colors. You can name your shapes to help tell them apart. If you want a full list of commands, just ask for help.

It really helps to have a display so you can see what you are doing.
